00256   // We could put this into TGlobalData::Clear(), but we need
00257   // to be sure that's okay at the alcapana level. That is, if
00258   // Clear() deletes the TPulseIsland objects, but g_event doesn't
00259   // own the pulses, they would be deleted later. A solution is to
00260   // be sure that TGlobalData isn't called in alcapana, or ensure
00261   // that g_event owns the pulse islands at that level.
